website_summaries.verdict: Deluxe model for serious fruit and veggie juicers.
pros: Makes up to one quart of juice
Large feeding chute means you don't have to chop up most produce beforehand
Reviewers love that you can feed a whole apples, carrots, and oranges
Cleaning process only takes about five minutes
Quiet - won't wake up the whole family
cons: Pulp can stay somewhat moist, meaning that machine doesn't get out all of the juice

customer_reviews.title: Look no further finally the fifth and final juicer is the best!!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I are new to juicing and was looking for the right juicer. We’ve been through 4! Juicers til we received this one. And it was worth the wait. Nothing shoots out from anywhere no holes for food to get through. It’s quiet it’s easy to clean up it does get waste buildup but takes seconds to clean it up!!! I can 100% tell you this machine is the best. We’ve tried machines from $60 to $200 and they were all terrible especially the more expensive machine that was the worst. You will not be disappointed if you order this machine. I did the leg work for you !!! Extremely satisfied!!!
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Does not meet expectations!
customer_reviews.text: I was so disappointed in this juicer. It was good for apples, carrots ects. But I put a whole bag of spinach and a bag of kale and barely saw any juice. When I went to clean pulp I could squeeze juice out with my hand. I sent an email to Cuisinart to ask questions or why I was missing so much juice, but never got a reply from their customer service department. Don't buy if you want to juice greens.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great juicer
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I love it, we have been using it for nearly two months now, it works great, the settings guide in the book is useful, and it is fun combining fruits for different flavors. Orange mango pineapple is good!
customer_reviews.author: editer

customer_reviews.title: Solid juicer but some parts quality issues
customer_reviews.text: The straining bowl pulled apart after one use and the cylinder to push the produce down cracked after one weeks use
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money or time with this juicer
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money or time with this juicer! It leaves the fiber completely soaked and the juice comes out with bits. I have a Jack lalanne juicer that I was trying to replace but honestly it does a much better job than this juicer. Aesthetically it's a beautiful machine but that's about it! If I could give it a 0 stars I would.
customer_reviews.author: Brisa DP

customer_reviews.title: Awesome machine
customer_reviews.text: This centrifugal juicer is fantastic! It has 5 speeds and cleans up fairly easy. It comes with a brush to clean the basket which is super helpful. It works on all veggies and fruits I could throw at it. Even the green kale. You’ve got to slow it way down and add apples in front of it and apples at the back of it. It helps expose the kale and slow it down. Slow is better for green leafy veggies. This thing works!
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: Makes some good juice but cleaning is a pain
customer_reviews.text: Like many other juicers on the market, this one can make some good juice from many fruits and veggies. I was hoping this one would be easier to clean than my Breville, but it's not. I have yet to use a good juicer that also is easy to clean. Regardless, this juicer makes good juice and that's what I'm looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Nel

customer_reviews.title: Good value, not disappointed at all
customer_reviews.text: I juice celery every morning and i only had to break the stalks in half to feed them into the juicer. Fast, powerful, i like the foam plate, it legit helps. I scrubber that comes with helps tremendously with the mesh/blade part. Ez to take apart and put back together. Line the pulp catcher side with a plastic bag before to eliminate one more step of cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: morg

customer_reviews.title: I wish I had not purchased this.
customer_reviews.text: I guess I expected way too much. This thing gets plugged up on a moments notice.
customer_reviews.author: Jack A.

customer_reviews.title: This prosuct is a total waste of money. i have never enjoyed it...
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst juicer I have ever seen. It does not juice anything rather whenever you plug it in to juice, the cables inside starts burning. Every drop of juice coming out from the machine will have the burnt cable smell. it is a total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is the juicer I’ve been searching for!!
customer_reviews.text: Cuisinart is a name you can trust for performance! We have used our Cuisinart food processor for lots of years and it’s still performing. We thought we’d try the Cuisinart CJE-1000 Die-Cast Juice Extractor. Oh my goodness!! It is amazing! My whole family is enjoying fresh varieties of juice made with kale, apples, celery, spinach, beets, carrots, ginger, cucumber and any fruit or veggie combo we can think of. I HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS JUICER !!!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Tatelbaum

customer_reviews.title: Clear instructions
customer_reviews.text: You have to be really careful when putting the top cover back on, mine is stuck and I have tried everything to remove it but it feels like it’s breaking when using force so I could only use it one time. Really should be a warning to give you a heads Up of how not to put the top on
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Looking forward to many years of juicing with this one
customer_reviews.text: This juicer replaced a Jack LaLane Juicer that we had for over 16 years. We love processing fresh juice from our pomegranate trees and citrus trees. Juicing is seasonal for us but we needed a good one to stand up to hours of use at a time. This is our favorite juicer so far. It's details in design make it far easier to use than our other one. Quality construction and durable parts inside. Hoping to get years and years of use out of it. Clean up is faster and easier as well.
customer_reviews.author: SuzieNJAZ

customer_reviews.title: Love our Cuisinart Juicer ❤
customer_reviews.text: This is our 2nd Cuisinart juicer..we totally love it. Easy to use and clean at a good price. Has a wide feeder for large veggies and looks very stylish. If you like to juice then this is for you ! We have used other brands over the years and this is by far the best.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Never used It
customer_reviews.text: Never used it. To many parts to clean just to get a glass of juice. Sent it back with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: I wanted a juicer for softer vegetables and fruit that ...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a juicer for softer vegetables and fruit that would juice quickly. I reurned this juicer because hardly any juice yielded from 1 bunch of kale or a pint of strawberries. Although it quickly juiced the hard vegetables, the pulp from carrots, beets, celery, and Apple was very wet. I could squeeze out more juice from the pulp with my hands. I will stick with my Green Star masticating juicer. It cost more money up front and takes longer to extract the juice but the pulp is very dry. This 5 speed juicer is cheaper up front but you will be paying more for the amount of vegetables you need to get a glass of juice.
customer_reviews.author: Rose M.

customer_reviews.title: Too much waste
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to juice celery. It gets the job done, but with a ton of waste. It takes 3 bunches of celery to get 32 ounces of juice. However, if you put the pulp in a mesh bag, you can get another 16 ounces. I wouldn’t buy this one again. Bummed I’m stuck with it.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Rose

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: On our second juicer and it too is going back. The first one lasted 3 days and about 4 uses when the lid got stuck on for no reason that I could see, luckily Amazon is awesome and sent a replacement the next day. Unfortunately, the replacement is no good either. Initially I was very happy with how easily and quickly this worked to extract juice, also the pulp, as first was very dry. Though, after just a couple uses it seemed to start falling apart, running very rough and loud, and bucking up off the counter with softer fruits and veggies. Very disappointing because the design seemed great, but turned out to be a piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: Lori MyersTop Contributor: Activewear

customer_reviews.title: Good juicer at reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: this is a good product with good design. I gave one less star because the very small plastic part that goes below the blade is not designed well. While most part are idiotproof (will only fit one way otherwise it just won't fit), that plastic part could be fitted in at least two different ways. One right and one wrong. There is no marking or writing to tell you which is correct and it's not clearly mentioned in manual either. Initially I ended up putting it wrong and no juice will be able to flow thru. But once I figured that out, this unit works like a charm. I would certainly recommend to my friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: MynK

customer_reviews.title: It Purrs!
customer_reviews.text: Love my Cuisinart Juicer! had an old unit that was extremely noisy & vibrated across the counter as if it was ready to take off. So it was time to look for a new one! Consumer Reports rated this very highly & mentioned it is fairly quiet & it is! The 5 settings are great, the pulp holder easy to remove & clean. The juice holder w/ a spout & foam separator are a nice touch! The Amazon price was good & w/ A Prime got it pronto!
customer_reviews.author: Socrates

customer_reviews.title: A Nightmare!
customer_reviews.text: I used it once and washed it. Trying to use it again, the handle wont lock and I cant open it. What a nightmare!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent juicer
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had multiple juicers of another popular brand. This one is just as good but a much better price! It assembled easily and quickly and makes for excellent meal replacements. It’s also very quiet in comparison to other comparable juicers. Extremely happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie McFarland

customer_reviews.title: No juice
customer_reviews.text: Barely got any juice out of this thing. A pain to clean. I should have spent the money on a nicer machine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: We enjoy this machine a lot, we are a senior couple and juice almost every day for health reasons. It does a great job and produces stated quantities of juice that the recipes we use state. The only con so far is it is a bit of a pain to disassemble and clean.
customer_reviews.author: K. Gardner

customer_reviews.title: 😂
customer_reviews.text: I am a chef and I like this brand for my home...that said...the plastic chute broke in 40 days after purchase....
customer_reviews.author: ~{ThaDon}~

customer_reviews.title: Good basic juicer at a fair price.
customer_reviews.text: I juice only celery in the unit. It does a good job and is relatively easy to clean. I hand wash it every day, takes 5 minutes, and machine wash it weekly. This machine is a good value for the price paid.
customer_reviews.author: J. Mershon

customer_reviews.title: Great Juicer!
customer_reviews.text: I like it... I hate cleaning it - even when we clean it DIRECTLY after using it. But I think that's normal for any juicer! right? It gets most of the juice out of our veggies/fruit. Sometime, we still have wet pulp in the bag... but the instructions say you can re-juice the pulp to get the rest of the juice out. We didn't :) Overall, makes awesome juice. We really enjoy juicing!
customer_reviews.author: MGraczyk

customer_reviews.title: Please keep it simple
customer_reviews.text: I like Cuisinart products. They are steady and last long. This juicer works wonders. I would have preferred 1) a smaller juice extractor for it to fit under the kitchen's cabinet; 2) to keep it simple. It has extra pieces that need to be removed to be cleaned. Other than that, I'm happy with the juice extractor. I use it daily.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy Huffstetter

customer_reviews.title: Great product, plenty of power, clean up easier than others I have tried that cost more
customer_reviews.text: The machine has plenty of power, thanks to reading the reviews I was prepared for the unit to be rather large. I viewed the video's on-line about how to use and clean this machine before I purchased the machine. I did find this machine easier to clean than others that I had in the past that cost more. The pulp discarded was actually less than I expected. The machine has plenty of power and I have yet to use the pusher other than as a cap. I would recommend this machine to others and also mention that it will take up a big footprint on the counter but I think it is worth the space.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty, works great
customer_reviews.text: This is a heavy duty juicer that really does a great job of extracting the juice from fruit and vegetables. We use it almost daily and it just keeps whirring along. It comes apart nicely for cleaning, too. Just make sure you clean it right away (a thorough rinsing is really all it needs). If you let some of the extracted peel and skin dry onto the plastic or the stainless steel grater, you'll be sorry and probably will rinse it immediately every time after that!
customer_reviews.author: goin2games

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean and put back Together
customer_reviews.text: Great Great juicer 100% Recommended since everything on description is the best as described and more..Very easy to use to clean and fast enough to prepare your favorite juice of fruits and vegetables. Specially doesn’t take up too much room.
customer_reviews.author: Esmeralda

customer_reviews.title: I did not think I would like a juicer as I have a Vita-mix
customer_reviews.text: I did not think I would like a juicer as I have a Vita-mix; however, I have used it several times and like it a lot. My grandchildren like the juice that I make even if it has some ingredients they don't like i.e. beets, kale, and celery. I would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: rbertani

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: I started incorporating this into my diet to make sure I got my daily required fruit and vegetable for the day. So far, it works great! Nothing you buy at the store can compare to real fruit juice. I feel healthier, I love trying the recipes that come in the instructional booklet. And I can tell you through real exprience, and veggie/fruit juice at around two in the afternoon does far better for you than any five hour energy bottle. The only drawback is that it can be a bit annoying and difficult to clean. But if you're serious about getting your health in order, this is a definite help!
customer_reviews.author: Macha

customer_reviews.title: Great Juicer
customer_reviews.text: Great juicer. Easy to use and I love the safety features.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 100% recommended just love it
customer_reviews.text: You can say that cuisinart has done something amazing with this juice extractor and the juice bible has changed my life in just a few weeks I have been able to lose weight and my health has improved a lot more
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's Ok
customer_reviews.text: This machine was a fairly good value. It really does juice well. I was left with very dry pulp, and got quite a bit of juice from everything I juiced. However the clean up is horrifiic. The blade and mesh around it is impossible to clean. I actually have no idea how to actually get all of the food particles out. So here's the deal- for just around $150 its not a bad machine. However after cleaning it once I'm just not feeling ambitious enough to use it agian. It worked, I got lots of juice and it juced everythign I tried. Apples, kale, spinach, cucumber, berries and grapes.
customer_reviews.author: Heather W.

customer_reviews.title: Great Juicer
customer_reviews.text: Speedy juicing with no need to cut vegetables down (except to fit the width of the tube) like I had to do with my Jack LaLane Juicer. It takes more time to wash and prepare vegies than to juice them. Plus it's easy to clean once you've done it a few times. Look no further, get this one. Here's to your health.
customer_reviews.author: Bev

customer_reviews.title: Broke right out of the box; never even plugged it in
customer_reviews.text: We received our juice extractor today and when my husband took it out of the box and tried to get it set up, the plastic hinge on the back of the lid broke right off. We are trying to replace a juicer we've had for over 15 years and obviously this is not the one for us. Very disappointed as we did a lot of research before purchasing. #cuisinart Total time unpacked: less than 15 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The leftover that is the fiber or whatever that is left over is kind of wet.
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't make too much noise and it is not that it needs more speed, it needs more torque power. Overall it is a more or less good enough juicer, I can't much complain about it, so far, but I just bought it and have used it only a few times.
customer_reviews.author: FERNANDO

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: It's amazing I never thought it will be this great but it work perfectly ok ....it leave no jucie in the in the pulp
customer_reviews.author: Rajendra bhagwandin

customer_reviews.title: One issue
customer_reviews.text: Did a great job until something snapped internally after a couple months. DISAPPOINTING! It was great when it worked!
customer_reviews.author: Michael & Diana Burchardt

customer_reviews.title: the clasp could've been built better and the motorized power seems to outdo the chassis ...
customer_reviews.text: Not fair to ask me as this is more or less a product strictly for use at home. Nevertheless, the clasp could've been built better and the motorized power seems to outdo the chassis it's built on.
customer_reviews.author: C. Emptor

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Love the fact that the opening is big enough to fit apples. Cleaning is not as bad as many other models that I've had, as the parts are all pretty big. Overall my favorite juicer I've ever had.
customer_reviews.author: D DiVo

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, durable, heavy base although it still moves around when in use unless you place it up against the edge of a wall, works great, easy to clean, loud noise when in use
customer_reviews.author: Ame Salcedo

customer_reviews.title: Disappearing Juices
customer_reviews.text: I gave it two starts for good build quality and features. However, the design is not the best. A lot of the juice ends up where the pulp is, so in the end there's a lot of waste and you get less juice which is the point of using this machine in the first place. If they can keep the quality but innovate the design, I'd be the first in line to try it.
customer_reviews.author: IronTank

customer_reviews.title: This juicer has proved to be an excellent way to create delicious juice with said fruit
customer_reviews.text: With a tangerine tree and a juice orange tree, I needed to find a way to use all my citrus fruit that I couldn't give away. This juicer has proved to be an excellent way to create delicious juice with said fruit! It's relatively easy to dismantle and clean...but, too troublesome to use if you just want to juice a few pieces of fruit. However, for larger batches (and I'm sure smoothies), this will be an excellent tool for the kitchen!
customer_reviews.author: Karen R.K.

customer_reviews.title: Great Juicer!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great Juicer! I had been using a fusion juicer and went to this one. I like that this one has a bigger pulp container and i dont have to stop in the middle of some of my juices to dump the pulp to continue...this one is awesome how you can control the speed at which you put stuff through thats new for me...the fusion juicer wasnt like that...i like this one alot more even though i did have my other one for a long time....
customer_reviews.author: P. Combs

customer_reviews.title: ALL Good, Thumbs Up!
customer_reviews.text: I like my carrot juice and this guy delivers as promised!. Easy to disassemble and just wash off.
customer_reviews.author: GlobalTrekker

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love this juicer. Easy to use and easy to clean up. Juices almost anything. I really use it during canning season. Great for tomato sauces and juices. Peel the peaches and you get peach juice for jelly and peach pulp for jam. This stands up to the work out for days of work. I liked mine so much, I got another one for my mom's birthday. She discovered a quick way to juice apples. With the apple juice she made jelly with the pulp she made apple sauce. It's an awesome product.
customer_reviews.author: M Parker

customer_reviews.title: Good juice extractor but many parts to clean
customer_reviews.text: Great juice extractor but it would be nice if it was easier to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Irma

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use Easy to clean and has a lot of power
customer_reviews.text: I opened the box and started using it without even reading the instructions. This is very easy to use. Also very easy to take apart and clean and put back together. Just a lot of parts. I've only used it a few times but love it so far
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for what I needed it for
customer_reviews.text: This juicer works great. Cleaning it was a bit of a pain, but I did large batches at one time so I didn't have to run it too often, which helped.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon B.

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised!
customer_reviews.text: I received my juicer on Saturday and have used have used it everyday since. Completely impressed with how well it juices and the clean up isn't as bad as I have experienced in the past. I am very please with this juicer
customer_reviews.author: Beth williams

customer_reviews.title: Great juicer
customer_reviews.text: Works great, easy to clean. Much less foam than other model I tried.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean and very functional variable speed drive
customer_reviews.text: We have been very pleased with this juicer compared to some of the others out there. The variable speed option is nice to vary between softer and harder food items. It certainly pulls an adequate amout of juice but can tend to froth up and jam the feeder (before it goes into plastic container). Of course this depends when you use soft fruits such as mangos and oranges. Other than that it is about average to clean it after each use and can be ready to go within a matter of minutes. I would certainly explore the purchase of this juicer over the Breville and other brands from the practicality and speed variability it has.
customer_reviews.author: George D. Parada

customer_reviews.title: very good
customer_reviews.text: great juicer for price. I use it 3 to 4 times a week for fruits, veg and herbs. Clean up is not so bad especially if you place a small plastic grocery bag inside the catch area. Happy juicing! The benefits are amazing and my hot flashes have finally stopped.
customer_reviews.author: Matt McCann

customer_reviews.title: The item I received was NOT new
customer_reviews.text: The item was NOT new. It had been previously open, used and cleaned (not very well cleaned).
customer_reviews.author: John Doe

customer_reviews.title: Yum!!
customer_reviews.text: Who knew juicing would taste so good... I would say clean up is never enjoyable so a quicker way is to add a trash bag in the container for easy clean up. I gave it four stars only because the juice tends to get all over the counter. I would put a towel on the counter to help absorb any leaks!
customer_reviews.author: LaineTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: however the amount of waste it produces is massive
customer_reviews.text: It definitely makes juice, and seems made well, however the amount of waste it produces is massive, and still "wet". Cuisinart has not disappointed me thus far, so I suppose it's just me wanting a masticating juicer at a centrifugal juicer's price.
customer_reviews.author: Doug K215

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use
customer_reviews.text: The machine is actually very good. The one thing that does not work properly is the knob for the spout. After you remove the container and close the know, it drips. No matter what you do. Otherwise, it is a good buy. We are happy with it. We make vegetable and fruit juices and it has worked so far
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo R.

customer_reviews.title: read the operating manual to get the best out of this
customer_reviews.text: outstanding powerful juicer. I have three of these units. Just opened the third one when I got to AZ. 6 weeks after I purchased and took delivery. Unfortunately the main hinge was broken and not fixable. I Don't really know how to get a return or replacement so make sure you inspect unit upon arrival so as to not fall out of return window. Other than that I love these units.
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: Ok but be careful
customer_reviews.text: I used this juicer couple of time and many times just push the whole fruit in trash can’t take banana juice rest of that is fine
customer_reviews.author: Azeem sultan

customer_reviews.title: Love the juicer by Cuisinart
customer_reviews.text: Love the juicer by Cuisinart. Handy, easiy to use and clean, as juicers go, and the minimal waste is fairly dry. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: JazzY

customer_reviews.title: Best device for Carrots and apple juice.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one, bought it as a gift. I shopped for less expensive ones but was not satisfied with any products like this Cuisinart for making carrot juice / celery/ beet, etc. My girlfriend was very with it especially since she tried other brands. Highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Maher

customer_reviews.title: had others this is the best
customer_reviews.text: Really nice juicer, like much better than a pricier one that I previously had. Easy to use and clean though it does have a lot of bits and pieces but I wash and let air dry so no big deal.
customer_reviews.author: nornando

customer_reviews.title: Juicer
customer_reviews.text: I love this Juicer, it's fast, easy and convenient....clean-up is easy
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie R. Lee

customer_reviews.title: money well spent
customer_reviews.text: Very powerful motor and can handle any veggies I put in it. This is my first juice extractor so I really had nothing to compare it to but I am so glad I bought this model. I even add different seeds to my drink concoctions...sunflower, almonds, peanuts, etc. I would not hesitate to recommend this juicer to anyone...even amateurs like myself!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five stars!
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous! I have had 3 other juicers and this one is wonderful! Easy to use and clean and sturdy too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Decent for what you pay. God to use if you are new to juicing
customer_reviews.author: Cloud

customer_reviews.title: Great Juicer, I have only has the unit for ...
customer_reviews.text: Great Juicer, I have only has the unit for two weeks but its awesome. the unit is well built and very quite in operation. I juice every day and so far it has had no problem with anything i have thrown at it. Carrots , pineapple, pears, apples, lime, blueberries. and the pulp is pretty dry so it seems to be getting most all of the juices out of the fruits and veggies i put in. Its really easy to clean up I hand wash everything but its also dishwasher safe if you just want to hand wash. in all it takes about 15 minutes to juice and clean up. well worth it!!
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: The best I had bought so far
customer_reviews.text: The best I had bought so far. I have 4 of them, I use them for the business and they had last me longer than any other brand, others break really quick cause I use them a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Best Juicer
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been juicing for over 20 years and have used several juicers. This is my absolute favorite one. Very well made, quieter than any of them, easy to put together and nice style!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy a smaller and more economical juicer
customer_reviews.text: It takes up way too much space, buy a smaller model because you are not going to use this size unless you are standing in the kitchen juicing for a large crowd in which I hope you have two refrigerators because this beast doesn't make much juice without a garden of fruits and veggies.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: They really like it but have only used it a handful of ...
customer_reviews.text: This is for my husband and daughter. They really like it but have only used it a handful of times. It does make wonderful drinks, just need to find more recipes. There is some clean up; better than previously owned ones. It came in early and nicely packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Pammer

customer_reviews.title: A little big for a small family
customer_reviews.text: It honestly is perfect. Perfect for bigger families. My family and I love it but will be ordering a small version to have for to go times
customer_reviews.author: Velia L Juarez

customer_reviews.title: Good, very powerful
customer_reviews.text: So far have only done carrots. It works fine. Considering carrots are some of the hardest to juice.Cleaning is not hard. 4 stars for the carrots alone. We will see how it does on other things over time. Have not had it long enough for 5 star.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: One of the best products of Cuisinart
customer_reviews.text: One of the best products of Cuisinart. I love this Brand and this machine, you can prepare all kind of fruit and vegetable juices. perfectly separates the juice from the pulp, and last but not least, the container has a division that makes a final separation. Really you take the best of each ingredient.
customer_reviews.author: Lester Lungo

customer_reviews.title: Juice happiness
customer_reviews.text: Looked at many before commiting to the CJE-1000. From the reviews, this unit seemed to have it all, 1000 watt motor, 5 speeds, quiet, and easy to clean. I can honestly say the reviews were correct! Hats off to Cuisinart for putting out such a fine product! We been using it for 7 weeks and it's performance is as good as day one! Easy to clean and wonderfully quiet. Uh, we like it!
customer_reviews.author: Larry boy

customer_reviews.title: the quality Juice extractor
customer_reviews.text: This Cuisinart Juice maker is good enough to make any kind of Juice. We enjoy to drink vegetable and fruit juice from this machine. I see the company studied hard how to make juice in best way.(good price, quiet operating, easy set up and clean and so on) Buy this quality extractor, and you will be happy. I also recommend the coffeee maker.(I think the burr grind and brew maker)
customer_reviews.author: sys

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: The first one lasted 2 months after 3 uses. Try to contact the warranty and sent back to fix, paid $40 shipping fee. They can’t fix and sent me a new one. Unfortunately, the replacement is no good either, stop working after 2 uses . I wish I had not purchased this.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Riedel

customer_reviews.title: It was damaged with two months of use
customer_reviews.text: I bought it three months ago and after two months of use it did not start. Try to contact the warranty and they do not respond
customer_reviews.author: John Pall

customer_reviews.title: Love the juicer, hate the clean up
customer_reviews.text: Love this juicer. Very fast, gets rid of pulp. A lot of moving parts to clean though and they are not easy to clean. But that's the only drawback. I still love it.
customer_reviews.author: mom2stella

customer_reviews.title: A Happy Juicer
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with my new Juice Extractor . Easy to use and clean. Great Quality Product. I am so Happy I purchased this item and I am seeing great rejuvenating results with my health.
customer_reviews.author: ellen scroggs

customer_reviews.title: Healthy Juicer
customer_reviews.text: The Cuisinart juice extractor works much better than other brand purchased.
customer_reviews.author: JMC

customer_reviews.title: Very Powerful.
customer_reviews.text: After reading reviews of several juicers I decided to go with this model. Mostly because I trust the Cuisinart name for quality and dependability. I almost went with the smaller Cuisinart 500 model but chose this bigger one for the power. It works very well! as with all juicers the clean-up takes time but I am in the routine of it now.
customer_reviews.author: Karen W

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this juicer.I just got my juicer two days ago. Some of the negative reviews did leave me a little a apprehensive, but this juicer works like a dream and whisper quiet. i know there were a lot of complaints about the pulp not being dry enough. I find that the pulp was as dry as can be expected it is an awesome juicer. I onced owned a champion juicer and although it was a fine juicer the clean-up was just a bit much for me. Totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: booklover

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: It is a awesome. Exactly how I expected it to be.
customer_reviews.author: pedro bacelis

customer_reviews.title: Fine piece of machinery.
customer_reviews.text: Perhaps I'm just getting old, but its a two way tie for most exciting part of my day, between when I walk my dog and he finally poos and when I get to fire up my Cuisinart CJE-1000 and make myself some fresh, delicious and nutritious juice.
customer_reviews.author: Derek T. Rudolph

customer_reviews.title: You won’t be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this juicer, I’ve used daily since I got it. Plan on an extra 10 minutes to clean it thoroughly but it is worth it. I researched for a few weeks and this one kept coming up as the most highly rated and amazon had the best price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes excellent juice
customer_reviews.text: Quick and easy to use and clean up. Great for our family's celery cleanse
customer_reviews.author: Sue C.

customer_reviews.title: be well versed
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made product made up of many pieces,But a real job to clean after using and a little confusing for first time buyers. Also one would expect .due to ignorence one orange ... a small cup of orange juice.werll maybe i cup 10 oranges would work better or 5 very large oranges ......But its a nice machine .
customer_reviews.author: theverybravest

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great extractor. Absolutely love it. It may seem a hassle to clean because it's big but it is simple to pull apart and put back together. Really not that much pain. You'll love the juices.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Acosta

customer_reviews.title: It's just so perfect, I really use it for basic things
customer_reviews.text: It's just so perfect, I really use it for basic things. But I still use it everyday. I can't complain at all it does a really good job.
customer_reviews.author: Marylee Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Great juicer
customer_reviews.text: This juicer is a beast, easy to use. Clean-up time is minimal once you get a feel for how to deconstruct the pieces. Already made my neighbor get one.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Higgins

customer_reviews.title: Very solid juicer
customer_reviews.text: Juicer has performed as expected thus far, the foam separating pitcher is a nice feature.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome juicer
customer_reviews.text: This juicer is really good. The motor is alittle loud but that because it's strong. It's very easy to clean and has a great instruction pamphlet. The juice always comes out nice and smooth highly recommend this juicer!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality product!
customer_reviews.text: After researching different juicers, I gave this one a try based on the positive reviews others had provided. I'm extremely pleased with the quality of this juicer and the price can't be beat. Its super quiet and easy to clean!
customer_reviews.author: REDHEAD7

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: We love our juicer! Works well, creates LOTS of pulp and needs to be thoroughly cleaned after each use. Make sure the valve is open before you start juicing, otherwise you'll put a bunch in and get nothing out!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa H.

customer_reviews.title: I couldn't be more happy!
customer_reviews.text: We got this juicer and put it through the ringer instantly. We're constantly juicing carrots, greens whatever it can take it! It was so worth the hundred dollars. I couldn't be more happy!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: I have been using this daily for over a year ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this daily for over a year with no issue. I chose this over the Breville because it has a stronger motor and the price was lower.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn K.

product_meta.title: Cuisinart CJE-1000 Die-Cast Juice Extractor
product_meta.description:
Item Display Length:19.0 Inches| Display Height:12.0 Inches

CUISINART CJE-1000 JUICE EXTRACTOR
Equipped with a 1000-watt powerful motor, this easy-to-use juice extractor makes it exceptionally convenient to enjoy fresh, healthy fruit and vegetable juice from the comfort of home. The unit's large 3-inch feeding chute can accommodate whole apples, pears, and other large-size fruits and vegetables (extra-large items may need to be cut into smaller pieces first). 

Choose from five speed settings by turning the control dial with the blue LED light ring, then watch as freshly extracted juice flows effortlessly from the anti-drip adjustable flow spout. The thoughtfully designed appliance also provides an exclusive easy unlock and lift system, a filter basket specially designed to reduce foam, and a high-quality design that runs quietly--no need to wake up the whole family when getting an early start on the day. 

ACCESSORIES
Accessories include a 2-liter pulp container that makes it easy to discard unwanted pulp and a 1-quart juice pitcher for collecting juice to serve at the breakfast table or to store in the refrigerator for later. The unit's removable parts clean up easily by hand or in the dishwasher, and a cleaning brush comes included. Housed in die cast and stainless steel, the juice extractor measures approximately 15-2/5 by 11-4/5 by 19 inches.

 PRODUCT FEATURES
 * 2-liter pulp container: Easy to remove and clean
 * 1-liter juice pitcher: Easily transfers to table or fridge
 * 1000 watts of power
 * Recipe book included with instruction manual
 *  
 * Die-cast and stainless steel housing for elegant finish and durability
 * Cuisinart exclusive easy unlock and lift system
 * Cuisinart exclusive foam management filter disk
 * Cuisinart exclusive anti-drip adjustable flow spout
 * All removable parts are dishwasher safe for easy clean up
 * Large 3 inch feed tube for whole fruits and vegetables
 * 5-speed dial control with blue LED light ring
 * Quiet operation
 * Easily juices hard and soft produce
 * Cleaning brush included for quicker clean up
 * Limited 3-year warranty

VEGETABLES, FRUITS AND THEIR KEY VITAMINS AND MINERALS
Vegetable Vitamins Minerals Asparagus A, B1 (thiamine), C, choline, folic acid potassium Beets A, C, chlorophyll, B6 calcium, potassium, choline and iron Cabbage B6, C iodine, potassium and sulfur Carrots A, C potassium, calcium, phosphorus and carotene Celery organic alkaline minerals (balances blood PH levels) Cucumber Good diuretic Potassium Fennel alkaline, calcium and magnesium content Kale A and chlorophyll calcium Parsley A, C, and chloropyll calcium Parsnips A, C, and chloropyll calcium Radishes C choline, phosphorus, potassium Spinach A, B complex, chlorophyll calcium, iron, magnesium, phosphorous, potassium Peppers A, C potassium Tomatoes C calcium Fruit Vitamins Minerals Apples A, B1, B2, B6, biotin, folic acid and pantothenic acid choline, copper, iron, magnesium, manganese, phosphorous, potassium, silicon, sodium and sulfer Cherries A, C, B1, B2, folic acid and niacin calcium, cobalt, iron, magnesium, phosphorous, Potassium, Contains powerful alkalizing properties. A, C, B-complex and folic acid calcium, iron, phosphorous, potassium and enzymes Grapes A, B1, B2, C and niacin calcium, copper, iron, magnesium, manganese and phosphorous Grapefruit B-complex, C, E, K, biotin and inositol calcium, phosphorous and potassium Lemons and Limes C and citric acid Very strong cleanser. Melons A, B-complex and C High in enzymes. Oranges A, B-complex, B1, B2, B6, C, K, biotin, folic acid and niacin calcium, choline, copper, flourine, iron, manganese, magnesium, phosphorous, potassium, silicon and zinc Peaches A, B1, B2, C, and niacin calcium, iron, phosphorous and potassium Pears A, B1, B2, C, folic acid and niacin phosphorous and potassium Pineapples C choline and potassium. High in enzymes. Strawberries C calcium, phosphorous and potassium Watermelons A chlorophyll, enzymes and good cleanser
feature_bullets: 1000-watt 5-speed juice extractor with large 3-inch feeding chute
Control dial with blue LED light ring; anti-drip adjustable flow spout; easy unlock and lift system
Foam-reducing filter basket; die-cast and stainless-steel housing; dishwasher-safe parts
Includes 2-liter pulp container, 1-quart juice pitcher, and cleaning brush
Product Built to North American Electrical Standards
